name: An Intro To Building Figma Plugins
description:
This file is meant to help designers visualize concepts and understand the Figma plugin API.


One challenge of building your own tooling is understanding how Figma works behind the scenes.


This file is a work in progress but aims to explain:

  • Nodes
  • Node properties
  • How figma files are structured
  • An easy way to use the API in the console
  • How styles, components, and your library connect to the API
  • Resources for you to build your own plugin!


If this file is helpful, we may expand on it in the future.
